titles.title: Providing for an adjournment of both Houses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 232 - 167 (Roll no. 368).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 7/26/1996--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from August 1, 2, or 3 until September 4, 1996, and a recess or an adjournment of the Senate from August 1, 2, 3, or 4 until September 3, 1996.
